**"The Avengers" (2012)**

"The Avengers" is an American superhero movie about a team of heroes who join forces to save Earth from Thor's evil brother, Loki. The team includes Iron Man (Tony Stark), Captain America (Steve Rogers), Hulk (Bruce Banner), Thor, Black Widow (Natasha Romanoff), and Hawkeye (Clint Barton).

Directed by Joss Whedon, the film was a huge success, making over $1.5 billion worldwide. It was praised for its action, special effects, and the way it brought together different superheroes from earlier Marvel movies. Since its release, it's inspired several sequels and is considered one of the greatest films of all time.
